alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pike (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pike, Upson and southern Lamar Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Molena, or 9 miles northwest of Thomaston, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Zebulon, Molena, Yatesville, Meansville, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Concord, Atwater, Hilltop, Lifsey Springs, Redbone Crossroads, Crest, Redbone, Logtown, Sunnyside, and Hannahs Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
